value.description: Enter the contents of the field

placeholder.description: A placeholder when the input box is empty

placeholderClass.description: 指定 placeholder 的样式类
placeholderClass.description_zh: 指定 placeholder 的样式类

maxlength.description: The maximum input length is set to -1 without limiting the maximum length
maxlength.description_zh: 最大输入长度，设置为 -1 的时候不限制最大长度

autoHeight.description: When autoHeight is set to autoHeight, style.height does not take effect
autoHeight.description_zh: 是否自动增高，设置 autoHeight 时，style.height不生效

fixed.description: If the Textarea is in a position:fixed area, you need to display the specified property fixed as true
fixed.description_zh: 如果 Textarea 是在一个 position:fixed 的区域，需要显示指定属性 fixed 为 true

cursorSpacing.description: Specifies the distance between the cursor and the keyboard, in px. Take the minimum of the distance from the bottom of the Textarea and the distance specified by cursorSpacing as the distance from the cursor to the keyboard
cursorSpacing.description_zh: 指定光标与键盘的距离，单位 px 。取 Textarea 距离底部的距离和 cursorSpacing 指定的距离的最小值作为光标与键盘的距离

cursor.description: Specify the cursor position when focusing
cursor.description_zh: 指定 focus 时的光标位置

showConfirmBar.description: Whether to display the bar with the Done button at the top of the keyboard
showConfirmBar.description_zh: 是否显示键盘上方带有”完成“按钮那一栏

selectionStart.description: Cursor start position, effective when auto-gathering, needs to be used with selectionEnd
selectionStart.description_zh: 光标起始位置，自动聚集时有效，需与 selectionEnd 搭配使用

selectionEnd.description: The end of the cursor, which is valid when automatically gathering, needs to be used in conjunction with selectionStart
selectionEnd.description_zh: 光标结束位置，自动聚集时有效，需与 selectionStart 搭配使用

adjustPosition.description: When the keyboard pops up, whether the page is automatically pushed up
adjustPosition.description_zh: 键盘弹起时，是否自动上推页面

holdKeyboard.description: focus, and do not collapse the keyboard when clicking on the page
holdKeyboard.description_zh: focus 时，点击页面的时候不收起键盘

disableDefaultPadding.description: Whether to remove the default padding under iOS
disableDefaultPadding.description_zh: 是否去掉 iOS 下的默认内边距

nativeProps.description: Used to transparently transfer properties on WebComponents to internal H5 labels
nativeProps.description_zh: 用于透传 WebComponents 上的属性到内部 H5 标签上

confirmType.description: Set the text for the button in the lower-right corner of the keyboard
confirmType.description_zh: 设置键盘右下角按钮的文字
confirmType.type: send / search / next / go / done / return

confirmHold.description: Whether to keep the keyboard unfolded when you click the button in the lower right corner of the keyboard
confirmHold.description_zh: 点击键盘右下角按钮时是否保持键盘不收起

name.description: The name of the component, which is used to obtain data for form submission.
name.description_zh: 组件名字，用于表单提交获取数据。

showCount.description: Whether to render the word count function (whether to remove the default counter/whether to display the word count).
showCount.description_zh: 是否渲染字数统计功能（是否删除默认计数器/是否显示字数统计）。

controlled.description: Whether it is a controlled component. When true, the value content is fully controlled by setData.
controlled.description_zh: 是否为受控组件。为 true 时，value 内容会完全受 setData 控制。

ariaLabel.description_zh: 无障碍访问，（属性）元素的额外描述

onFocus.description: Triggered when the input box is focused

onBlur.description: Triggered when the input box loses focus
onBlur.description_zh: 输入框失去焦点时触发

onLineChange.description: It is called when the number of lines in the input box changes
onLineChange.description_zh: 输入框行数变化时调用

onInput.description: When the keyboard is typing, the return value of the onInput handler that fires the input event is not reflected on the textarea
onInput.description_zh: 当键盘输入时，触发 input 事件onInput 处理函数的返回值并不会反映到 textarea 上

onConfirm.description: When you click Complete, the confirm event is triggered
onConfirm.description_zh: 点击完成时， 触发 confirm 事件

onKeyboardHeightChange.description: This event is triggered when the keyboard height changes
onKeyboardHeightChange.description_zh: 键盘高度发生变化的时候触发此事件
